mainBoard.flavorText: As the infection spread, Nahiri's thoughts grew tangled. She needed to protect what she loved from Phyrexia... or maybe only Phyrexia could protect what she loved.

foreignData.flavorText: Während sich die Infektion ausbreitete, wurden Nahiris Gedanken immer verworrener. Sie musste alles, was ihr lieb war, vor Phyrexia beschützen … oder vielleicht konnte nur Phyrexia beschützen, was ihr lieb war.
foreignData.name: Verlockung der Möglichkeiten
foreignData.text:
Wirf als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, eine Karte ab.
Ziehe zwei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: A medida que se extendía la infección, los pensamientos de Nahiri se confundían cada vez más. Debía proteger lo que amaba contra Pirexia..., o quizá solo Pirexia podía proteger lo que amaba.
foreignData.name: Entusiasmo ante la posibilidad
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, descarta una carta.
Roba dos cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: Tandis que l'infection se répandait en elle, les pensées de Nahiri s'emmêlèrent. Elle devait protéger ce qu'elle aimait contre Phyrexia... à moins que seule Phyrexia puisse protéger ce qu'elle aimait.
foreignData.name: Frisson de probabilité
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, défaussez-vous d'une carte.
Piochez deux cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: Man mano che l'infezione si diffondeva, i pensieri di Nahiri si facevano confusi. Doveva proteggere ciò che amava da Phyrexia... o forse solo Phyrexia poteva proteggere ciò che lei amava.
foreignData.name: Brivido della Possibilità
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, scarta una carta.
Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 感染が広まるにつれ、ナヒリの思考が錯綜していく。彼女は愛するものをファイレクシアの手から守らなくてはならない……いや、もしかしたら愛するものを守れるのはファイレクシアだけなのかもしれない。
foreignData.name: 胸躍る可能性
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、カード１枚を捨てる。
カード２枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText: Conforme a infecção se espalhava, os pensamentos de Nahiri se embaralhavam. Ela precisava proteger de Phyrexia as coisas que amava... ou talvez só Phyrexia pudesse proteger as coisas que ela amava.
foreignData.name: Frisson das Possibilidades
foreignData.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, descarte um card.
Compre dois cards.

foreignData.flavorText: 随着侵染不断扩散，娜希丽的思绪逐渐纠结。她需要保护心爱事物免遭非瑞克西亚毒手…但或许只有非瑞克西亚才能真正施以保护。
foreignData.name: 快意拼搏
foreignData.text:
弃一张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
抓两张牌。

mainBoard.name: Thrill of Possibility
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

rulings.text: You must discard exactly one card to cast Thrill of Possibility; you can't cast it without discarding a card, and you can't discard additional cards.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

mainBoard.flavorText: While some predators specialize in speed, size, or deadly venom, the adaptive tyrranax see no need to limit themselves.

foreignData.flavorText: Viele Raubtiere spezialisieren sich auf Geschwindigkeit, Größe oder Gift. Die Tyrranax beschränken sich nicht.
foreignData.name: Tyrranax-Scheußlichkeit
foreignData.text:
Eile
Toxisch 3 (Spieler, denen von dieser Kreatur Kampfschaden zugefügt wird, erhalten außerdem drei Giftmarken.)

foreignData.flavorText: El punto fuerte de algunos depredadores es la velocidad, el tamaño o el veneno mortal, pero el tyrranax adaptado no ve la necesidad de limitarse.
foreignData.name: Tyrranax atroz
foreignData.text:
Prisa.
Tóxico 3. (Los jugadores que reciben daño de combate de esta criatura también obtienen tres contadores de veneno.)

foreignData.flavorText: Certains prédateurs se spécialisent dans la vitesse, la taille ou le venin mortel, mais avec ses capacités d'adaptation, le tyrranax ne voit aucune raison de se limiter.
foreignData.name: Atrocité tyrranax
foreignData.text:
Célérité
Toxique 3 (Les joueurs qui subissent des blessures de combat de cette créature gagnent aussi trois marqueurs « poison ».)

foreignData.flavorText: Mentre alcuni predatori hanno il loro punto forte nella velocità, nelle dimensioni o nel veleno mortale, il tyrranax adattivo non vede alcuna necessità di limitarsi.
foreignData.name: Atrocità Tyrranax
foreignData.text:
Rapidità
Tossico 3 (I giocatori a cui viene inflitto danno da combattimento da questa creatura ottengono anche tre segnalini veleno.)

foreignData.flavorText: 捕食者には速度や大きさ、致死性の猛毒に特化したものがいるが、適応力のあるティラナックスはそれらに絞る必要はないと考える。
foreignData.name: 非道なティラナックス
foreignData.text:
速攻
毒性３（このクリーチャーから戦闘ダメージを受けたプレイヤーは追加で毒カウンター３個を得る。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・恐竜

foreignData.flavorText: Enquanto alguns predadores se especializam em velocidade, tamanho ou peçonhas mortais, os adaptáveis tyrranax não veem motivo para autolimitação.
foreignData.name: Atrocidade Tyrranax
foreignData.text:
Ímpeto
Tóxico 3 (Os jogadores que sofrem dano de combate desta criatura também recebem três marcadores de veneno).

foreignData.flavorText: 虽然有些猎者专精于发展速度、体型或致命毒素等优势，但善于适应环境的霸蛛龙觉得没必要限制自己。
foreignData.name: 凶残霸蛛龙
foreignData.text:
敏捷
下毒3（受此生物战斗伤害的牌手还会得到三个中毒指示物。）

mainBoard.name: Tyrranax Atrocity
mainBoard.originalText:
Haste
Toxic 3 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get three poison counters.)

rulings.text: A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game. This is a state-based action and doesn't use the stack. In other words, it happens immediately and players can't respond to it, just like a player losing the game due to having 0 or less life.
Any other effects of that damage, such as life gain from lifelink, still apply.

Conversely, replacement effects that apply to the number of counters put on a player can modify the counters placed this way. For example, Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider's last two abilities can apply to counters placed this way.

Damage dealt by a creature with toxic grants the same number of counters regardless of how much damage is dealt. Notably, if a replacement effect modifies the damage in some way (such as that of Gratuitous Violence), the number of counters given remains unchanged.
If a creature with toxic deals combat damage to a creature or planeswalker, or if it deals noncombat damage, toxic has no effect and no player gets poison counters.

Multiple instances of toxic are cumulative. For example, if a creature has toxic 2 and gains toxic 1 due to another effect, combat damage that creature deals to a player will cause that player to get 3 poison counters.

Toxic doesn't change the amount of combat damage a creature deals. For example, if a 2/2 creature with toxic 1 deals combat damage to a player, that creature will deal 2 damage. The results of that damage are the player loses 2 life and gets a poison counter.

mainBoard.text:
Haste
Toxic 3 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get three poison counters.)

mainBoard.flavorText: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

foreignData.flavorText: Sie ist im Einklang mit der Essenz ihres Meisters.

foreignData.text:

mainBoard.name: Commander's Sphere
mainBoard.originalText:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

rulings.text: If you don't have a commander, Commander's Sphere's first ability produces no mana.
If you have two commanders, the ability adds one mana of any color in their combined color identities.
If your commander is a card that has no colors in its color identity, Commander's Sphere's first ability produces no mana. It doesn't produce {C}.

mainBoard.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: Silent observers swim through the air of Norn's Seedcore, watching the nascent Invasion Tree for any signs of interference.

foreignData.flavorText: Stille Beobachter schwimmen durch die Lüfte von Elesh Norns Saatkern. Sie halten Ausschau nach Störungen am aufkeimenden Invasionsbaum.
foreignData.name: Kopffüßer-Wachposten
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Die Stärke des Kopffüßer-Wachpostens ist gleich der Anzahl an Artefakten, die du kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: Los observadores silenciosos nadan por el aire del Núcleo de la Semilla de Norn y buscan en el Árbol de la Invasión naciente cualquier indicio de intromisiones.

Vuela.

foreignData.flavorText: Des observateurs silencieux flottent dans les airs autour de la Drupe de Norn, guettant tout signe d'interférence avec l'Arbre d'invasion naissant.

foreignData.text:

mainBoard.name: Cephalopod Sentry
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Cephalopod Sentry's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.

rulings.text: The ability that defines Cephalopod Sentry's power works in all zones, not just the battlefield. As long as Cephalopod Sentry is on the battlefield (and still an artifact), that ability will count Cephalopod Sentry itself.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Cephalopod Sentry's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.

mainBoard.flavorText: The Mirran forces thought they'd vanquished their foes . . . until a nearby monument got up and started stalking toward them.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Mirran-Streitkräfte dachten, sie hätten ihre Gegner bezwungen … Bis ein Denkmal in der Nähe plötzlich aufstand und auf sie zuwankte.
foreignData.name: Wanderndes Bauwerk
foreignData.text: Wenn das Wandernde Bauwerk ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Wenn du dies tust, erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: Las fuerzas mirrodianas pensaban que habían vencido a sus enemigos..., hasta que un monumento cercano se levantó y empezó a avanzar hacia ellas.
foreignData.name: Construcción ambulante
foreignData.text: Cuando la Construcción ambulante entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Cuando lo hagas, la criatura objetivo obtiene -1/-1 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Les forces mirranes pensaient avoir vaincu leurs ennemis... jusqu'à ce qu'un monument se dresse et s'avance dans leur direction.

foreignData.flavorText: ミラディン軍が敵を打ち負かしたと思っていたのは、近くの記念碑が立ち上がり、彼らに向かって歩き出すまでだった。

mainBoard.name: Ambulatory Edifice
mainBoard.originalText: When Ambulatory Edifice enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. When you do, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: You don't choose a target for Ambulatory Edifice's last ability at the time it triggers. Rather, a second "reflexive" ability triggers when you pay 2 life this way. You choose a target for that ability as it goes on the stack. Each player may respond to this triggered ability as normal.

mainBoard.text: When Ambulatory Edifice enters, you may pay 2 life. When you do, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

−3：放逐目標生物。

mainBoard.name: Kaya, Bane of the Dead

rulings.text: If a spell or ability you control targets an opponent with hexproof or an opponent’s permanent with hexproof, and Kaya leaves the battlefield while that spell or ability is on the stack, that player or permanent becomes an illegal target for that spell or ability. This includes Kaya’s own loyalty ability.

mainBoard.text:
Your opponents and permanents your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof.
[−3]: Exile target creature.

foreignData.text:

foreignData.text:
Voar, atropelar
Toda vez que um Dragão que você controla ataca, ele ganha golpe duplo até o final do turno.

foreignData.text:

mainBoard.name: Linvala, the Preserver
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Linvala, the Preserver enters the battlefield, if an opponent has more life than you, you gain 5 life.
When Linvala enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more creatures than you, put a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: For each triggered ability, the game checks to see if the condition is true at the moment the ability would trigger. If the condition isn’t true, the ability won’t trigger. If the ability does trigger, the game will check again to see if the condition is true as the ability tries to resolve. If it’s not true at that time, the ability won’t do anything.
In a multiplayer game, it’s possible for the condition to be true at both times but with respect to two different opponents.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
When Linvala, the Preserver enters, if an opponent has more life than you, you gain 5 life.
When Linvala enters, if an opponent controls more creatures than you, create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying.
